artist: Artist: Katsukawa Shun'ei; Publisher: Nishimuraya Yohachi
description: two uncut chūban appearing as a pseudo-diptych; left image two standing men watching a woman kneeling behind a tray; right image a man in a long robe kneeling in front of a woman, a man in background holding a fan watches
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From The Syllabary Copybook of the Treasury of Loyal Retainers (Kanade hon Chūshingura)
title: Act I and Act II
